mapper.sql: user.ID as ID, user.Email as Email, user.Password as Password, user.Name as Name, authority.ID as Authority_ID, authority.Name as Authority_Name, company.ID as Company_ID, company.Name as Company_Name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(Email, Password, Name, Authority_ID) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{authority.id})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM user LEFT JOIN company ON user.Company_ID = company.ID, authority WHERE user.Authority_ID = authority.ID AND user.ID = #{id}
